column5: April 30 (Reuters) - The following financial services industry appointments were announced on Monday. To inform us of other job changes, email moves@thomsonreuters.com.
column6: The specialist insurer, a unit of U.S.-based Markel Corp , appointed Debbie O’Sullivan as senior yacht underwriter to its marine team.
column7: David Prior, a former UK undersecretary of state, has returned to the firm as a senior adviser in its financial advisory unit, mainly to work with its healthcare team.
column8: The investment manager named Michel de Carvalho as chairman of the group. (Compiled by Sanjana Shivdas in Bengaluru)
